selectRepeats: select * from test where id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' or id like '%s' limit 10
selectAndSort: select * from test order by id desc
createNewRowInAuthor: insert into author (name, login, email) values ('newAuthor7', 'newLogin7', 'newemail7@mail.ru')
selectRandomIdFromAuthor: select id from author order by RAND()
